title: 3 Honest Reasons Why I Partner with Facet
subtitle: Discover the benefits of working with Facet for your financial planning needs.
content:
3 Honest Reasons Why I Partner with Facet

Here are three honest and simple reasons why I continue to partner with and endorse Facet.

1. No Sales Pitch, No Hidden Fees

Facet charges a flat annual membership fee. That’s it! No 1% of your assets, no commissions, and no surprise charges for the privilege of having someone call you buddy while pushing annuities like it’s QVC for retirement products.

2. Real Planning, Not Fortune Telling

Facet helps with the actual stuff that matters: taxes, budgeting, retirement. They don’t pretend to have a crystal ball that tells you what the S&P will do next Tuesday.

3. Clear Communication

Facet's advisors do not try to impress you with fancy terms like alpha generating exposure or tax-optimized glide paths. They talk like actual people and listen to you. Revolutionary, I know!

Conclusion

If this sounds like the type of team you’d want on your side, go to facet.com/tyler today and find out what separates them from the rest. Even from the woods of Vermont, I know enough about what’s out there to know that this is a good business, providing a good service.
